name: Helen THOMAS, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (WINZEK CATERING SERVICE), Respondent
name_abbreviation: Thomas v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

parties: Helen THOMAS, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (WINZEK CATERING SERVICE), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
Prior report: 104 Pa.Cmwlth. 361, 522 A.2d 115.
PER CURIAM.
Petition for allowance of appeal granted. The order of the Commonwealth Court is vacated, and the matter is remanded to the referee for further hearings to determine the actual earnings Petitioner would receive as a telephone solicitor, given her qualifications.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
544 A.2d 958
Helen THOMAS, Petitioner, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (WINZEK CATERING SERVICE), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 1988.
